page.title: 20CONCLUSION & CREDITS
page.content:
Cranham is a good place to live in and grow up in. Most of us will be happy to spend our lives here. We enjoy all the advantages of urban living without too many of the disadvantages. There are plenty of trees and open spaces and the countryside is nearby. The seaside is not far away and we are lucky to be living within easy reach of the centre of London.
{We like our community and our schools {in this year of 1985!
This Domesday Project was prepared by {Hall Mead School {Oglethorpe Junior School {Engayne Junior School { Upminster Junior School.
